column4: any chance that there is someone who can help me get me my tv output working? currently i've tried to use twinview and a seperate X, yet they either don't work (blank screen) or black and white (twinview) ...
black and white probably works except for some NTSC-PAL issue or Component/s-video output issue
that sentence didn't make much sense... but you're probably only missing some option with twinview
did you try this option in Device    Option          "TVOutFormat" "Composite" #or SVIDEO etc
one RCA cable (often uses a s-video to rca adapter)
i don't know what a SCART plug is...
try the s-video option instead of composite maybe?
one of those wide plugs for your tv ... the same thing you can connect a video or a dvd player with (just noticed... you have an extra 2 behind your name ... sorry for mistyping)
I just checked what SCART is and it's only popular in Europe ;)
yeah .. i was afraid of such a thing ... yet my tv only supports SCART :(
did you try the s-video instead of composite in your xorg.conf
i think i did that in the first place ... let me check without it
I don't know... maybe there are Europeans here who would have a better idea
